contents.text: Thank you for calling Adobe in San Francisco, where we empower you to create, deliver, and optimize digital experiences.
Press 1 for Creative Cloud plans and design solutions.
Press 1 for Creative Cloud plans and pricing.
Please hold while we connect you to a specialist in Creative Cloud plans and pricing.

navigationGoals: Compare Creative Cloud plan tiers and pricing for my design team’s needs quickly.
I need details on monthly and annual costs for Creative Cloud plans to budget for my veteran nonprofit project.
Review and compare Creative Cloud design plan pricing for team deployment
I’m calling to understand my options and pricing for a Creative Cloud subscription.
Compare student discount tiers and subscription options for the Adobe creative suite.

contents.text: Press 2 for technical support with our design applications.
One moment please. We’re connecting you to Adobe design application support.

navigationGoals: Resolve a crashing issue in Photoshop so I can meet my deadline.
I’m unable to install Photoshop on my Mac; I need help troubleshooting the installation.
Troubleshoot Photoshop performance issues with GPU acceleration
I need help troubleshooting my design app—Photoshop won’t open on my computer.
Troubleshoot an export error in Photoshop to finalize my physics lab diagrams.

contents.text: Press 2 for marketing tools and enterprise account support.
Press 1 for Adobe Experience Cloud digital marketing tools.
Please hold while we connect you to our digital marketing solutions team.

navigationGoals: Set up a trial and get onboarding details for Adobe’s digital marketing tools.
I want to set up an email marketing campaign using Adobe Experience Cloud for my veteran support initiative.
Configure Adobe Experience Cloud marketing automation workflows
I want guidance on using Adobe’s digital marketing tools to set up a basic email campaign.
Inquire about trial and feature access for Adobe Experience Cloud to manage our student club’s website.

contents.text: Press 2 for enterprise account and licensing support.
Please hold while we connect you to enterprise account services.

navigationGoals: Update license count and billing information on our enterprise Adobe account.
I need to update my team’s Adobe Enterprise account by adding and renewing user licenses.
Adjust enterprise licensing agreement to add Creative Cloud seats
I need help renewing my enterprise license and updating our account billing information.
Add a seat to my university’s enterprise Adobe license for the new semester.
